entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Tracadie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:55 AM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 3 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023
